title: Nowhere to Turn
description: Lenora is in turmoil. She is the epitome of being a city girl, she’s a college graduate, working hard at her career, is married, yet something is missing as she starts to fantasize about the neighbor hunk. At the same time, she gets suspicious of her husband and suspects he’s having an affair so she sets out to find out for herself and discovers much as secrets unfold.
author: C.J. Starr
